title: What Are We Looking Forward to in the Playoffs? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by the newest member of The Ringer's staff, Wosny Lambre, to talk about what they're expecting and looking forward to come playoff time.

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Wosny Lambre
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
